articles.author: Ayat Al-Tawy, Ellie Kaufman
articles.title: Dead bodies line the streets amid fighting in Sudan; American confirmed among fatalities - ABC News
articles.description: One-third of health facilities in Sudan are out of service.
articles.content: NEW YORK--Dead bodies lined the streets of the Sudan capital of Khartoum, as intense fighting between the Sudanese military and Rapid Support Forces continued for a sixth day. The fighting has caused… [+4707 chars]
